props.name: label
props.description: The text label of the tab. If content is provided in the `label` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: id
props.description:
The ID for this tab.

If you don't provide an ID, one will be generated automatically.

props.name: selected
props.description:
Whether this tab should default to selected. If no tab in the tab group is set to `:selected="true"`,
the first tab in the group will be selected.
